definition: leeward/downwind/disadvantageous position/to concede or give way in an argument
down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action
to step down gracefully (humble expression)/to concede defeat/to play second fiddle

sentences.english: Circulated air design keeps shower area clean in non-shower state.
sentences.chinese: 循環風設計，保證非吹淋狀態下風淋區內的潔淨度。

sentences.english: Put the fire on lee side, with relative wind abeam.
sentences.chinese: 置火於下風舷，並使船側受風。

sentences.english: As for Yahoo, it's throwing in the towel on search.
sentences.chinese: 對雅虎來說，它這是在搜索業務上甘拜下風了。

sentences.english: I have got the wind up about him have a car accident.
sentences.chinese: 我們必須轉而駛向下風，風太大了。

sentences.english: I've really got to hand it to you.
The leading boat fell off when the wind grew too strong.
sentences.chinese: 風吹得太猛時，領頭的船轉向了下風。

sentences.english: Warnings were issued to people living downwind of the fire to stay indoors.
sentences.chinese: 已經向住在火勢下風處的人們發出不要出門的警告。

sentences.english: Yunshu cigarette test arms, was the message the next month before the wind.
sentences.chinese: 雲舒菸捲試懷抱，月下風前得消息。

sentences.english: Downswings are especially difficult to recover from because there are multiple forces working against you.
sentences.chinese: 下風期極難恢復，因爲有多種力量對你施壓。

sentences.english: You cheer for the same losing football team.
sentences.chinese: 你們爲同一支落了下風的橄欖球隊加油鼓氣。

sentences.english: Careless steering brought the wind by the lee.
sentences.chinese: 不經心的駕駛使風吹到帆的下風面來了。

sentences.english: I never felt we were dominated physically.
sentences.chinese: 我從未覺得我們在身體對抗上落下風。
保證下風處的窗口通風。

sentences.english: When you are a newcomer at work, you are at a disadvantage.
sentences.chinese: 在工作中，你是新來的，你就處於下風。

sentences.english: However, it notes private security forces remain outgunned.
sentences.chinese: 不過，調查報告指出，私人保安部隊仍處於下風。

sentences.english: PG is in a dominant position in the market of the daily chemical products. ;
sentences.chinese: 寶潔公司在日用化工產物市場上處下風地位。

definition: on the up/currently winning/rising (in popularity etc)
to march straight in unchallenged (military) (idiom)/(fig.) to push deep into the heart of sth/to flood in
to nurse a grievance/to harbor a grudge
to sink (into ruin, oblivion)/to be reduced to
enemy/to be a match for/to rival/to resist/to withstand
to guard/to protect/bodyguard (for officials in ancient times)
Tarsus, Mediterranean city in Turkey, the birthplace of St Paul
to hang or suspend/to worry/public announcement/unresolved/baseless/without foundation
